languages.text: {n}Дельцы хладного торга держатся тихо и смирно. Когда взгляд темноволосого случайно падает на них, шеи чуть пригибаются. Лишь Джай, задрав подбородок, будто отрицает его абсолютное превосходство, но напряженные черты ее лица говорят, что и ее не оставляет равнодушной присутствие сего гостя.{/n}

{n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дельцы хладного торга держатся тихо и смирно. Когда взгляд темноволосого случайно падает на них, шеи чуть пригибаются. Лишь Джай, задрав подбородок, будто отрицает его абсолютное превосходство, но напряженные черты ее лица говорят, что и ее не оставляет равнодушной присутствие сего гостя.{/n}

Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

{n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

languages.text: {n}冷市商人们恭敬地坐在一旁，默不作声。当黑发男子的目光不经意间落在他们身上时，他们的头垂得更低了。婕伊扬着下巴，似乎是在场唯一一个反抗那名男子绝对权威的人，但她紧张的表情表明，她也同样受到了那个人的影响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冷市商人们恭敬地坐在一旁，默不作声。当黑发男子的目光不经意间落在他们身上时，他们的头垂得更低了。婕伊扬着下巴，似乎是在场唯一一个反抗那名男子绝对权威的人，但她紧张的表情表明，她也同样受到了那个人的影响。{/n}

languages.text: {n}冷たき取引の行商人たちは、おとなしく黙って座っている。黒髪の男の視線がさりげなく彼らに注がれると、頭を下げる。あごを上げたジェイが、この男の絶対的な優位性に唯一反論しているように見える。だが、そのの緊張した表情は、彼の存在の影響下にあることを明らかに告げていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冷たき取引の行商人たちは、おとなしく黙って座っている。黒髪の男の視線がさりげなく彼らに注がれると、頭を下げる。あごを上げたジェイが、この男の絶対的な優位性に唯一反論しているように見える。だが、そのの緊張した表情は、彼の存在の影響下にあることを明らかに告げていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los mercaderes del Comercio Frío guardan un tímido silencio. Cuando la mirada del hombre de oscuros cabellos se posa sobre ellos, agachan aún más las cabezas. Solo Jae mantiene la cara en alto, refutando aparentemente la total superioridad de este hombre, pero la tensión de su rostro revela que su presencia también le afecta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los mercaderes del Comercio Frío guardan un tímido silencio. Cuando la mirada del hombre de oscuros cabellos se posa sobre ellos, agachan aún más las cabezas. Solo Jae mantiene la cara en alto, refutando aparentemente la total superioridad de este hombre, pero la tensión de su rostro revela que su presencia también le afecta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les marchands du Commerce Froid sont assis dans un silence docile. Lorsque le regard de l'homme aux cheveux noirs s'arrête sur eux, ils baissent encore un peu plus la tête. Jae, le menton levé, semble être la seule à démentir sa supériorité absolue, mais à voir son visage tendu, il semble évident qu'elle n'est pas non plus insensible à sa présence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les marchands du Commerce Froid sont assis dans un silence docile. Lorsque le regard de l'homme aux cheveux noirs s'arrête sur eux, ils baissent encore un peu plus la tête. Jae, le menton levé, semble être la seule à démentir sa supériorité absolue, mais à voir son visage tendu, il semble évident qu'elle n'est pas non plus insensible à sa présence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kalthändler sitzen demütig schweigend da. Als sie der dunkelhaarige Mann beiläufig ansieht, lassen sie ihre Köpfe noch weiter hängen. Jae hat ihr Kinn erhoben und scheint die Einzige zu sein, die die absolute Überlegenheit dieses Mannes anfechtet. Aber ihr angespannter Gesichtsausdruck zeigt deutlich, dass auch sie von seiner Anwesenheit beeinflusst wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kalthändler sitzen demütig schweigend da. Als sie der dunkelhaarige Mann beiläufig ansieht, lassen sie ihre Köpfe noch weiter hängen. Jae hat ihr Kinn erhoben und scheint die Einzige zu sein, die die absolute Überlegenheit dieses Mannes anfechtet. Aber ihr angespannter Gesichtsausdruck zeigt deutlich, dass auch sie von seiner Anwesenheit beeinflusst wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soğuk Ticaret tacirleri, uysal bir sessizlik içinde oturuyor. Siyah saçlı adamın bakışları onlara döndüğünde başları daha da eğiliyor. Çenesi dimdik duran Jae, bu adamın kesin üstünlüğünü reddeden tek kişi gibi duruyor. Gergin ifadesi, adamın varlığının onu etkilememiş olmadığını net bir şekilde gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The peddlers of the Cold Trade sit in meek silence. When the dark-haired man's gaze casually falls on them, their heads drop lower. Jae, with her chin raised, seems to be the only refutation of this man's absolute superiority, but her strained expression makes it clear that she is not unaffected by his presence either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soğuk Ticaret tacirleri uysal bir sessizlik içinde oturuyor. Siyah saçlı adamın bakışları onlara döndüğünde, başları daha da eğiliyor. Çenesi dimdik duran Jae, bu adamın kesin üstünlüğünü reddeden tek kişi gibi duruyor ama gergin ifadesi, adamın varlığının onu etkilememiş olmadığını net bir şekilde gösteriyor.{/n}
